reference.title: Preparing to install without internet access

section.p: This appendix includes procedures for downloading and installing or staging software and its operating system dependencies. This distribution option is available only to customers, to enable creating deployments without internet access.
The following table identifies where to perform each procedure in this appendix.

row.entry: The master host and all delegate hosts

section.p: The master and delegate host install chapters include references to this appendix that identify when to perform the preceding procedures.
